subject: CREATIVE SUITE 3 DESIGN PREMIUM READY TO DOWNLOAD $269.90 ONLY!
body:
A Great man is he who does not lose his childlike heart.

A conscience without God is like a court without a judge.

A lucky man is rarer than a white crow.

Both men and women are fallible. The difference is, women know it.

Dictators always look good until the last minutes.

I am acquainted with no immaterial sensuality so delightful as good acting.

If you would live innocently, seek solitude.

It's your aptitude, not just your attitude that determines your ultimate altitude.

Has fortune dealt you some bad cards. Then let wisdom make you a good gamester.

Danger past, God forgotten.

A national debt, if it is not excessive, will be to us a national blessing.

Thank Heaven, the sun has gone in, and I don't have to go out and enjoy it.

Of what does not concern you say nothing good or bad.
